alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:14PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Benton County through 345 PM PDT... At 314 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Paterson, or 16 miles northwest of Hermiston, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Benton County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
